title: New BMC URS LT full suspension gravel bike gets stealthy “micro travel” fork
content:
Give the all-new BMC URS LT too quick a glance and you’ll miss what makes it unique. Hidden inside the head tube is a custom, proprietary suspension steerer tube from HiRide, giving it 20mm of travel without changing the bike’s geometry.
